seo.title: Positano to Salerno by Ferry | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Door-to-door: Hostel Brikette to Positano’s port, ferry to Salerno, ticket tips and arrival notes.

intro.title: Positano to Salerno – Ferry
intro.body: Follow these steps to walk from Hostel Brikette to Positano’s port, buy your ferry tickets, and board for Salerno. Includes practical timing and operator tips, plus arrival notes for Salerno’s port and connection to the train station.

callouts.tip: Need alternatives if seas are rough? %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|How to Get Here overview% for backup routes.
